業者名稱: 法商西華股份有限公司台灣分公司
包裝: 4000劑量/安瓿，1000劑量/安瓿，2000劑量/安瓿
ingredients: ACH DOSE CONTAINS：ACTIVE-INGREDIENT：MAREK'S DISEASE RISPENS CVI988 STRAIN  AT LEAST 1608 PFU PER DOSE THROUGH EXPIRATIONCYROPROTECTANT NO.1+RISPENS CVI988 STRAINS  50~90%CYROPROTECTANT NO.2  10~50%CYROPROTECTANT NO.1每1000ML含：  1× CYROPROTECTANT BASE  690ML、L-GLUTAMINE (HYCLONE OR EQUIV.)  10ML、IRRADIATED BOVINE SERUM  300MLCYROPROTECTANT NO.2每1000ML含：  1× CYROPROTECTANT BASE  790ML、L-GLUTAMINE (HYCLONE OR EQUIV.)  10ML、DMSO  200MLNON ACTIVE-INGREDIENTS / PRESERVATIVE：GENTAMICIN  MAX 30μG/ML、AMPHOTERICIN B  MAX 2.5μG/MLCOMPOSITION OF DILUENT：SUCROSE  10GM、NZ AMINE AS  4GM、SORBITOL  45GM、K2HPO4  1.2GM、KH2PO4  0.5GM、PHENOL RED  0.02GM、DEIONIZED WATER  QS TO 1000ML
